title: DDG Demining SOM 2006-08
description: Increased conflict in Mogadishu, there is a need for a survey and Explosive Ordinance Disposal (EOD) and Mine Risk Education to reduce the contamination of the city by the Explosive Remnants of War (ERW). The project has the overall goal of assisting the Somali people with support to repatriation of IDPs and Refugees to Mogadishu through the creation of an environment free of the threat of landmines ERW.
